name: Add or update contacts in ActiveCampaign from new Tally responses
description: Effortlessly manage your leads by integrating Tally and ActiveCampaign. This template ensures that every time a new response is submitted in Tally, a corresponding contact is automatically created or updated in ActiveCampaign. Streamline your lead management process and enhance your marketing efforts with this seamless workflow, allowing you to focus on nurturing relationships rather than manual data entry.
